CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Airship AI Holdings, Inc. is an artificial intelligence (AI)-driven data management platform that solves complex data challenges for large institutions operating in dynamic and mission-critical environments with rapidly increasing volumes of data being ingested from a similarly rapidly growing number of data sources. It specializes in ingesting data from edge-based sensors used by government and law enforcement agencies around the world, including surveillance cameras (video), audio, telemetry, acoustic, seismic, and autonomous devices, along with large commercial corporations with fundamentally similar capabilities and requirements. Its primary offerings include Outpost AI, Acropolis, and Airship Command. The Company's offerings allow customers to manage their data across the full data lifecycle, when and where they need it, using a secure permissioned based architecture. The Company's offerings are used by government agencies and commercial organizations in the world.
